title: Smart Data Models - ExcAVR3
description: Adapted from CIM data models. Italian excitation system. It represents exciter dynamo and electric regulator.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be ExcAVR3

e1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Field voltage value 1 (E1).  Typical Value = 4.18. Default: 0.0

e2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Field voltage value 2 (E2).  Typical Value = 3.14. Default: 0.0

ka.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. AVR gain (K).  Typical Value = 3000. Default: 0.0

se1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Saturation factor at E1 (S(E1)).  Typical Value = 0.1. Default: 0.0

se2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Saturation factor at E2 (S(E2)).  Typical Value = 0.03. Default: 0.0

t1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. AVR time constant (T).  Typical Value = 220. Default: 0

t2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. AVR time constant (T).  Typical Value = 1.6. Default: 0

t3.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. AVR time constant (T).  Typical Value = 0.66. Default: 0

t4.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. AVR time constant (T).  Typical Value = 0.07. Default: 0

te.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Exciter time constant (T).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0

vrmn.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum AVR output (V).  Typical Value = -7.5. Default: 0.0

vrmx.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Minimum AVR output (V).  Typical Value = 7.5. Default: 0.0
